description.value:
Creates a barrier that hides all items and life signs behind it from detection from anything but psykers. Causes -30 to Scrutiny and Augury Sweep Tests. Can come in Personal and Ship sized, the ship sized being even rarer.

Requirements

One step easier to obtain if offered by a stryxis merchant.

Effect: Unique

Notes: -
